comments:
Demonstrate stochastic gradient descent optimization for a multilayer perceptron

This is demonstrated on MNIST.

:type learning_rate: float :param learning_rate: learning rate used (factor for the stochastic gradient

:type n_epochs: int :param n_epochs: maximal number of epochs to run the optimizer

:type dataset: string :param dataset: the path of the MNIST dataset file from http://www.iro.umontreal.ca/~lisa/deep/data/mnist/mnist.pkl.gz
